metadata.title: MERS coronaviruses from camels in Africa exhibit region-dependent genetic diversity

abstract.original_text: research; C.D. contributed new reagents/analytic tools; G.D., A.R., and M.P. analyzed data; and L.L.M.P., S.P., and M.P. wrote the paper. Reviewers: S.S.M., Columbia University; and V.J.M., National Institutes of Health. The authors declare no conflict of interest.
